channel.title: Portfolios on Verena Vertonghen
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Verena Vertonghen

item.title: Simply asbest - Website & branding
item.description: Organise and lead branding workshop to create a brand for SimplyAsbest. Responsible for the design and development of the SimplyAsbest website that I created by using Figma and Webflow. Responsible for the creation of a logo, illustrations and styleguide.

item.title: Eurocontrol - Workflow management tool
item.description: Create low fidelity wireframes in the early stages of the design. Create high fidelity mockups with the existing design system. Create clickable prototypes to demonstrate the full product experience. Create new UI components when needed that would be added to the design system. Provide documentation for the design system team according to their guidelines. Present designs to business in all phases of the design process to gather feedback and adapt to the needs of the users.

item.title: PayTalent Website & branding
item.description: Organise and lead branding workshop to create a brand for PayTalent. Responsible for the design and development of the PayTalent website that I created by using Figma and Webflow. Responsible for the creation of multiple designs for the PayTalent brand: Logo, Style guide, Social media templates, documents, posters, mugs…

item.title: GreenStack Website & branding
item.description: Responsible for everything related to design at GreenStack. Lead UX/UI designer of the internal timesheet application where I did user research and created the designs. Organise and lead branding workshop to improve the branding for GreenStack. Responsible for the design and development of the GreenStack website that I created by using Figma and Webflow. Responsible for the creation of multiple designs for the GreenStack brand: Logo, Style guide, Social media templates, documents, posters, … Worked as a consultant for other companies.

item.title: Delen Private bank - Sapphire Design System
item.description: Create new UI components with the necessary documentation about the component. UI components were added to the figma library and made use of variants so they were easy to reuse by the business and business anlysts. Collaborate with Component developers and App developers to ensure feasability, consistency and improve the way of working. Present achieved work and designs during the sprint review meetings. Review requests for new UI components and discuss if they should be added to the system or if there is an existing component that can be used instead.

item.title: Delen Private Bank - App for clients
item.description: Create low fidelity wireframes in the early stages of the design. Create high fidelity mockups with the existing styleguide/design system. Create clickable prototypes to demonstrate the full product experience. Create new UI components when needed that would be added to the design system. Present designs to business in all phases of the design process to gather feedback and adapt to the needs of the users. Gather requirements in collaboration with business analysts.

item.title: Delen Private Bank - Internal applications
item.description: Create low fidelity wireframes in the early stages of the design. Create high fidelity mockups with the existing styleguide/design system. Create clickable prototypes to demonstrate the full product experience. Create new UI components when needed that would be added to the design system. Present designs to business in all phases of the design process to gather feedback and adapt to the needs of the users. Gather requirements in collaboration with business analysts.

item.title: VDAB - Vind een job app
item.description: Create high fidelity mockups with the existing design system. Create new UI components when needed that would be added to the design system. Improve existing UI components. Develop my designs with html, js and css. Collaborate with the lead designer on the improvement of the new registration flow. Collaborate with the lead designer on the improvement of the “Vind een job” app.
